Secrets Filter Test File
========================

=== SHOULD BE REDACTED ===

# AWS Access Key ID (AKIA prefix + 16 chars)
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE

# GitHub Token (ghp_ + 36 alphanumeric chars = 40 total)
GITHUB_TOKEN=ghp_1234567890abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz

# Google API Key (AIza + 35 chars)
GOOGLE_API_KEY=AIzaSyDhG5YK9v8Hf2Rt3QpN7mJ1LkP6XnM4Wz8

# JWT Token (three base64url parts separated by dots)
JWT_TOKEN=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiaWF0IjoxNTE2MjM5MDIyfQ.SflKxwRJSMeKKF2QT4fwpMeJf36POk6yJV_adQssw5c

# OpenAI API Key (sk- prefix + 48 chars, or sk-proj- prefix)
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12345678abcdefgh
OPENAI_PROJECT_KEY=sk-proj-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz1234567890ABCD

# SSH Private Key (PEM header)
-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----
b3BlbnNzaC1rZXktdjEAAAAABG5vbmUAAAAEbm9uZQAAAAAAAAABAAAAlwAAAAdzc2gtcn
NhAAAAAwEAAQAAAIEA1234567890example_key_content_here_1234567890+/=
-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----


=== ENTROPY THRESHOLD TEST STRINGS ===
# Note: Full line (including variable name) must be 40+ chars for entropy detection
# Entropy is calculated on the FULL tokenized line (e.g., "ENTROPY_LOW=value")
# Detection triggers when: string_entropy >= threshold
# Lower threshold = more aggressive (catches more strings)
# Higher threshold = more conservative (catches fewer strings)

# Full line entropy ~3.9 - NOT caught at any threshold >= 4.0
# To catch this, set threshold to 3.9 or lower
ENTROPY_LOW=abcdABCDabcdABCDabcdABCDabcdABCDabcd

# Full line entropy ~4.7 - Caught at threshold 4.5 or lower, NOT at 5.0+
ENTROPY_MED=AaBbCcDdEeFfGgHhAaBbCcDdEeFfGgHh1234

# Full line entropy ~5.4 - Caught at threshold 5.0 or lower (all standard thresholds)
ENTROPY_HIGH=xK9mN2pQr5tYw8zAb3cDe6fGhJk4lMn7oPqRs


=== SHOULD NOT BE REDACTED (Known Limitations) ===

# AWS Secret Access Key - PATTERN was removed due to high false positive rate on file paths.
# However, this WILL BE REDACTED by entropy detection if enabled (threshold 4.5 catches this
# at entropy ~4.72). To test pattern-only detection, disable entropy_detection in config.
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=wJalrXUtnFEMI/K7MDENG/bPxRfiCYEXAMPLEKEY

# Database Password - Generic password variables have too many false positives
DB_PASSWORD=super_secret_password_123!
